prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        After mapping ingredients, optionally rewrite the cooking steps to reference the chosen products.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json

    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],

      "Gluten"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "12-Min Spinach Feta Egg Pita",
  "description": "A quick, mild one-pan scramble with spinach, tomato, and feta stuffed into warm pita. Familiar SA/Modern American flavors for a speedy solo bite.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "instructions": [
    "Whisk the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper in a small bowl.",
    "Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat and add the olive oil.",
    "Add the onion and cook 1 minute, then stir in the garlic for 20–30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "Add the tomato and spinach; cook 2–3 minutes until the spinach wilts. Season lightly with salt and pepper.",
    "Pour in the eggs and gently scramble with the vegetables for 1–2 minutes until just set.",
    "Crumble in the feta and fold for 20–30 seconds to warm through. Taste and adjust salt and pepper.",
    "Warm the pita bread over the pan or in a toaster for 30–60 seconds, then split and stuff with the scramble.",
    "Optional: Drizzle with HP sauce and serve immediately."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "eggs",
      "quantity": "2",
      "preparation": "whisked with a pinch of salt and pepper"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 small clove",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato",
      "quantity": "1 small",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "1 loosely packed cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "feta",
      "quantity": "30 g",
      "preparation": "crumbled"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pita bread",
      "quantity": "1 medium"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt and pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "HP sauce",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "optional drizzle"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Egg",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

    "Whisk 2 eggs (Free Range Large Eggs 6 pk) with a pinch of Salt and Pepper in Grinder 60 g in a small bowl.",
    "Heat a nonstick pan over medium and add 1 teaspoon Cooking Olive Oil 1 L.",
    "Add 2 tablespoons finely chopped Brown Onions (from Brown Onions 1 kg) and cook 1 minute, then stir in about 1/4–1/2 tsp Fresh Crushed Garlic 50 g for 20–30 seconds.",
    "Add 1 small diced Roma tomato (from Roma Tomatoes 4 pk) and 1 loosely packed cup Baby Spinach 200 g; cook 2–3 minutes until spinach wilts. Season lightly.",

    "Crumble in about 30 g Fat Free South African Feta Cheese 300 g and fold 20–30 seconds to warm through. Taste and adjust seasoning.",
